body:
This adds packages for epics-base (the core of the Experimental Physics and Industrial Control System) and for some extensions and drivers (epics-snmp for SNMP drivers, epics-ca-gateway for the Channel Access Gateway, and epics-pcas for the Portable Channel Access library that is required by epics-ca-gateway.)

I am not a developer of any of these, but I'm willing to maintain the packages.
title: Add epics packages
